item.title: [HTB] Machine: Tally
item.description: Tally Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.59 --min-rate 10000 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-09-30 20:46 BST Warning: 10.10.10.59 giving up on port because retransmission cap hit (10). Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.59 (10.10.10.59) Host is up (0.10s latency).
